Resume

Freelance Developer
Sept. 2015 -- Present

Since September 2015, I've been a freelance developer specializing mostly in WordPress development. I am currently in the process of picking up Python, however, and will soon be a freelance Python developer as well. My current exploits are listed above.

JavaScript Developer
Aisle Rocket Studios
Feb. 2014 -- Sept. 2015

At Aisle Rocket Studios, I worked with a team of developers to maintain large retail sites, as well as to create new experiences on-demand. I also worked with a smaller team within the organization to design, build, QA, and release a social media platform. I got experience working with Ruby on Rails, SCSS, Coffeescript, HAML, PHP, WordPress, Salesforce, AngularJS, Node.js, Mongodb, as well as HTML, jQuery, vanilla JS, and CSS.

Assistant Webmaster
The College of Communication and Information, Florida State University
May 2013 -- Dec. 2013

At The College of Communication and Information, I worked with the Webmaster to create a responsive WordPress child theme, built several WordPress plugins, develop the mission & vision for sites, and performed general content maintenance for a multi-site installation of over 30 sites.
